title: Part 1029 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants
content:
Part 1029 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants

State Regulations
§ 1029.1 - Applications for licenses as legal consultants; referral to committee on character and fitness
§ 1029.2 - Documents, affidavits and other proof required
§ 1029.3 - College and law school certificates
§ 1029.4 - Exceptional situations
§ 1029.5 - Authority of committee on character and fitness to require additional proof
§ 1029.6 - Undertaking
§ 1029.7 - Disciplinary procedure

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
